name: Chrysopoeian Crisis
Description: The members of the alchemy guild are secretive and difficult to work with. Can you convince them to let you join their guild?

flags.name: Quest Start
flags.description: Oikaaz advised you to visit the Alchemist's Guild in Tsu City to learn alchemy from a teacher.

flags.name: Guild Membership Requested
flags.description: You asked Linehart Wichperger if you could join the alchemists guild.

flags.name: Linehart's Request
flags.description: Linehart Wichperger asked you to plant poison in Hadeas Tajek's room.

flags.name: Pondering
flags.description: You asked to think about Linehart Wichperger's request.

flags.name: Agreed To Frame
flags.description: You agreed to plant poison in Hadeas Tajek's room.

flags.name: Poison Lost
flags.description: You told Linehart you lost the poison.

flags.name: Sent to Eastern Tsu
flags.description: Linehart said you could get poison from an alchemist in Eastern Tsu City.

flags.name: Poison Recipe Offer
flags.description: Sinapius asked you what you can give in exchange for the poison recipe.

flags.name: Check On Supplier
flags.description: Sinapius asked you to check on his alchemical goods supplier in Sunajo fortress.

flags.name: Money Offered
flags.description: You offered Sinapius money to get the poison recipe from him.

flags.name: Alchemical Knowledge Offered
flags.description: You offered Sinapius alchemical knowledge to get the poison recipe from him.

flags.name: Supplier In Pansoph
flags.description: You heard the supplier left Sunajo heading for somewhere in Pansoph.

flags.name: Found Supplier
flags.description: You found the supplier's cart had been abandoned near the lunacrest bridge.

flags.name: Poison Recipe Learned
flags.description: You offered Sinapius alchemical knowledge to get the poison recipe from him.

flags.name: Hadeas Confronted
flags.description: You confronted Hadeas Tajek about the previous headmaster.

flags.name: Hadeas' Request
flags.description: Hadeas Tajek has asked you to get Linehart kicked out of the guild.

flags.name: Agreed To Hadeas
flags.description: You agreed to try to get Linehart kicked out of the guild.
